snippet: “Grace and Frankie,” coming to Netflix next year, will feature Jane Fonda and Lily Tomlin as rivals who find their husbands are in love with each other.
abstract: “Grace and Frankie,” coming to Netflix next year, will feature Jane Fonda and Lily Tomlin as rivals who find their husbands are in love with each other.

headline.main: Jane Fonda and Lily Tomlin to Star in a Netflix Comedy Series
headline.print_headline: Jane Fonda and Lily Tomlin to Star in a Netflix Series
